import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import OrderItem from "../components/OrderItem"; import { useTypedSelector } from "../hooks/useTypedSelector"; import "./Register.css" export function Register() { const initialState = { login: "", password: "", confirmPassword: "", email: "", } const [formValue, setFormValue] = useState(initialState) const { login, password, confirmPassword, email } = formValue const handleChange=(e:any)=>{ console.log(formValue) setFormValue({...formValue,[e.target.name]:e.target.value}) } return (

Регистрация

) }
